price: 69. Oh bino bandimi! Bozala te lokola ba oyo banyokolaki Mûssa, kasi Allah alongolaki ye na mabe na bango, mpe azalaki na lokumu na miso ya Allah.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاذَوۡاْ مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِمَّا قَالُواْۚ وَكَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَجِيهٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takūnū ka-alladhīna ādhaw mūsā fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimmā qālū wakāna ʿinda al-lahi wajīhan
